Defensive Utility.description: 88 Speed EVs let Nidoqueen outrun Crawdaunt and Gligar.

Choice Scarf.description:
248 HP EVs ensure that Ditto will be able to use Struggle four times before fainting, and 252 Defense EVs minimize Struggle damage from an opposing Ditto. The minimum possible Speed allows Imposter to not activate first and therefore allow Ditto to have more Transform PP.

This is a sample set, stay tuned for future updates!

Tank.description:
Max HP and 8 Defense EVs takes any attack from +2 Cobalion barring All-Out Pummeling. 32 Attack Evs guarantee an OHKO on Houndoom-Mega.

This is a sample set, stay tuned for future updates!

Curse.description: The given EV spread lets Mega Steelix avoid an OHKO from +2 Cobalion's Close Combat and Mega Manectric's Overheat.

Utility.description: 180 Speed EVs let Metagross outspeed Adamant Tyranitar.

Mixed Wallbreaker.description: 168 Attack EVs let -1 Close Combat OHKO Krookodile.

Utility.description: 76 Defense EVs let Empoleon avoid an OHKO from Cobalion's Close Combat.

Defensive.description: 136 Speed EVs let Roserade outspeed Adamant Tapu Bulu.

Tank.description: Attack for a jump point + extra point. Max Special Defense investment to take hits with leftover HP investment, Speed investment for Tangrowth and Mega Aggron.

Choice Band.description:
Speed investment is for neutral base 60s (Swampert, Magnezone, Primarina). Can lower to hit neutral base 50s (Registeel) and increase bulk.

These are sample sets, stay tuned for future updates!

Offensive Pivot.description: 44 Defense EVs as a benchmark to avoid the 2HKO from Adamant Life Orb Mamoswine whilst maintaining speed.
EV spread avoids an OHKO from Cobalionâ€™s Close Combat while still outpacing Jolly Lucario.

Defensive.description:
Speed investment outspeeds Specs Primarina and Modest Magnezone. 252 HP / 160 SpD / 96 Spe is an alternative specially defensive spread.

This is a sample set, stay tuned for future updates!

Offensive Pivot.description: Investment in defense helps it stomach a hit from Choice Scarf Zarude. Can go max max offensive too.

Offensive Stealth Rock.description: EV Spread ensures that Speed is boosted after a KO. 4 Def / 252 SpA / 252 Spe is an alternative spread that maximizes Special Attack.

Meteor Beam.description: EV Spread ensures that Speed is boosted after a KO.

Calm Mind.description: A more defensive spread of 252 HP / 4 Def / 252 Spe Timid can be used with Cosmic Power over Calm Mind

Swords Dance.description: Bulk Up can be run in order to give Zarude more bulk while setting up.

Defensive.description: 64 Speed EVs allow Fezandipiti to outspeed Adamant Tapu Bulu and 100 Special Attack EVs guarantee an OHKO on physically defensive Tapu Bulu with Sludge Bomb.
